articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Chicago Mayor Lori Lightfoot loses re-election bid
articles.description: She was the first black woman and the first openly gay person to serve as head of America's third-largest city.
articles.content: The Democrat conceded defeat on Tuesday to two challengers, both Democrats, who will advance to a 4 April run-off vote.

articles.title: FBI director Christopher Wray says Covid origin 'most likely' from Chinese lab
articles.description: Christopher Wray says the FBI has "for quite some time" settled on a potential lab incident in Wuhan.
articles.content: "The FBI has for quite some time now assessed that the origins of the pandemic are most likely a potential lab incident," he told Fox News.
